talk.utter: Imagine introducing someone to social media and having to explain all these sad references…

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter:
I try to describe them to Perfesser Chaos and generally have to give up.

Bright side, he keeps demanding I explain the biblically-correct Alf sticker on my car and I refuse.

talk.author: did:plc:6tymxnn2kl65fd5fqhcmaq74
talk.utter: I’m trying to picture said sticker and I’ve got the giggles.
